tabs.Name: Exploit roasts
Content: Yo, with that peanut-sized avatar, nigga you’re moving like a JJSploit crash, pathetic, like a Skibidi Toilet extra who couldn’t even make the cut.
Nigger, why are you even talking? You’re built like a failed HappyMod install, glitching worse than a Skibidi Toilet episode on dial-up.
Bro, fuck off before I teleport your slutty-ass mom into a HappyMod script where she gets Skibidi-flushed back to 2005.
Nigga, you sound like you swallowed a JJSploit error message. Every word you say glitches out like you’re buffering IRL.
Nigger, stop trying to get close to me before I run a HappyMod script and turn your whole life into a broken Roblox server.
Shut the fuck up, nigger, or I’ll inject Lua into your trash ass PC and blow that shit up like it’s a failed HappyMod download!
Bro, you’re out here talking tough, but you’re built like a low-tier Roblox avatar using JJSploit, still can’t get out of the spawn.
This nigger thinks he’s all that, but his Wi-Fi’s powered by a free HappyMod script, trash connection, trash life.
You out here trash talking like a champ, but you’re playing like a broke-ass JJSploit user who can’t even hack right.
Bro, you’re built like a Roblox avatar that got rejected by Skibidi Toilet and now your entire setup runs on HappyMod fumes. Total clown.
Nigga, you’re out here built like a Roblox default skin, but moving like you downloaded life from HappyMod, full of bugs and errors.
Bro, you talk all this shit but play like a nigger stuck in a Skibidi Toilet cutscene, flushed out and forgotten.
